summary: This bill, "Modernizing America with Rebuilding to Kickstart the Economy of the Twenty-first Century with a Historic Infrastructure-Centered Expansion Act," addresses a wide array of issues. It focuses heavily on climate change, establishing a carbon tax and border adjustments, directing revenues to infrastructure projects and green initiatives. Other titles address healthcare (KO Cancer Act), veterans' affairs (Justice for ALS Veterans Act, Fairness to Veteran Small Businesses Act), voting rights (Let America Vote Act), financial regulations, school safety, and national security through intelligence review. The bill aims for bipartisan support by including items from different political agendas.
